verses.kjv: 12 This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
verses.niv: 12 My command is this: Love each other as I have loved you.

verses.esv: 22 If I had not come and spoken to them, they would not have been guilty of sin, but now they have no excuse for their sin.
verses.kjv: 22 If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloke for their sin.
verses.niv: 22 If I had not come and spoken to them, they would not be guilty of sin. Now, however, they have no excuse for their sin.
